content: Hi! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I please have your name to get started with scheduling your service?
It's Rachel. Can we just get this done quickly? I have a plumbing emergency.
Thank you, Rachel. I understand the urgency. Can you please provide your address so I can arrange for a plumber to come out as soon as possible?
4507 Oakwood Ave, Garland. Can you give me a ballpark price? Money is tight right now.
Thank you for the address, Rachel. Checking service area and price estimate for you now. May I ask what plumbing issue youâ€™re experiencing? That will help with the price estimate and dispatch.
My kitchen sink is leaking badly under the cabinet. Water everywhere. Just want an idea of what this will cost before I say yes.
Thanks, Rachel. I'm getting your price estimate now for a leaking kitchen sink. Also, what time would you ideally like someone to come out today?
As soon as possible, like this morning. And how much?

Our estimate for leaking kitchen sinks usually ranges from $99-$250, depending on the extent of the repair. The plumber can confirm the exact cost after inspection, and you can approve before any work starts. Checking our morning availability now.
We have a slot available for a plumber to arrive between 11:00am and 12:30pm today. Should I book this for you?
Yes, please book it. I need this fixed ASAP.
Your appointment is booked for today between 11:00am and 12:30pm. The plumber will call when en route. If you have any questions, please reply here. Thank you, Rachel!
